subclassFeature.name: Arcane Ordnance
entries: A mighty wizard infused you or one of your ancestors with war magic. They wanted an obedient living weapon that could channel raw arcane energy into simple, yet devastating bolts of force. They succeeded only in part: overwhelming power refuses to be shackled for long.

subclassFeature.name: Arsenal Spells
entries: {@i 1st-level Arcane Ordnance feature}

Your magic is anathema to mage and warrior alike. You learn certain spells at the sorcerer levels noted in the table below. They count as sorcerer spells for you, but they don't count against your number of Spells Known.
You can cast a 1st-level spell of your choice from this table without expending a spell slot once, and regain the ability to do so after finishing a long rest.

entries.caption: Arsenal Spells
rows: {@spell dimension door}, {@spell otiluke's resilient sphere||resilient sphere}
{@spell bigby's hand||arcane hand}, {@spell wall of force}

subclassFeature.name: Mystic Artillery
entries: {@i 1st-level Arcane Ordnance feature}

You are a wellspring of pure arcane power. You can cast {@spell magic missile} as a cantrip. When cast in this way, it only creates one dart. The number of darts increases when you reach certain sorcerer levels, increasing to two at 5th level, three at 11th level, and four at 17th level.

subclassFeature.name: Power Flux
entries: {@i 6th-level Arcane Ordnance feature}
Each of your Arsenal Spells adapts to the foes you face, letting you use any eligible Metamagic options on them, even if it's a Metamagic option that you don't have.
Additionally, when you cast {@spell magic missile}, you can modify it in one of the following ways:

entries.name: Seeking
entries: Each dart can target an unseen creature if you can still detect its location.

entries.name: Shattering
entries: Each dart can target and damage nonmagical objects that aren't being worn or carried.

entries.name: Shifting
entries: You can change the damage type of each dart to another damage type of your choice.

entries.name: Staggering
entries: You can force each Large or smaller creature hit by at least one dart to make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a creature is pushed up to 5 feet in a horizontal direction of your choice for each dart that hits it, to a maximum of 15 feet. A creature hit by three or more darts also falls {@condition prone} if it fails this save.

entries.name: Swarming
entries: You create one additional dart for each slot level above 1st used to cast this spell.

subclassFeature.name: Unstoppable Force
entries: {@i 14th-level Arcane Ordnance feature}

When you cast a spell of 1st level or higher, you can make a Charisma check to cast it at a target behind cover, bypassing its benefits. The DC is 15, 17, and 19 for half, three-quarters, and total cover respectively.
On a failure, if the spell targets a point of origin, the point of origin moves to the near side of the obstruction. If the spell targets a creature or object, it fails instead.

subclassFeature.name: Mana Barrage
entries: {@i 18th-level Arcane Ordnance feature}

You can unleash the full extent of your power in an overwhelming salvo. When you cast {@spell magic missile}, you can modify it to create eleven additional darts, and bypass any effects that would cause a creature to be unaffected by it, such as the {@creature Tarrasque||Tarrasque's} Reflective Carapace.
Once you use this feature, you can't use it again until you finish a long rest, unless you spend 7 sorcery points to use it again.
